item.title: Issue #2435 created
item.description:
Incorrect namespace prefixes in EXPath Binary example

In EXPath Binary Module 4.0 some example functions have been redefined in a different namespace prefix (which was bin:) to avoid suggesting they were part of the supported library.

However in 2.2 Example â€“ reading and writing variable length ASN.1 integers, the definitions of asn:int-octets() and asn:encode-ASN-integer() still contains references to the original prefix definition bin:int-octets() which should be asn:int-octets()
